ProductInfo.Features:
The Dell PC based 16 CH DVR 8 security cameras system provide real time display & High-image quality; Multi screen division display (full screen mode, 4, 8,12,16 division); Text on screen describing Ch., Recording status, Camera name, network status; Auto Switching function - 1ch, 4ch, 8ch switching
4 CCD bullet cameras and 4 CCD mini dome cameras
Display network connecting statue signal; Build-in web server; Support dynamic IP address; Adjustable display speed for high rate of recording speed
Recording scheduled by date and time; HDD can be set recycle mode; Search multi channels - 1, 4, 8, 16Ch. Simultaneously; Image compensation for clear image quality; Support Back up data of FDD, CD-RW, ZIP Drive, DAT
Adjustable playback speed for fast search and intensive search; Real-time monitoring and multi-channel searching via Network; Controlling network user to access; Recording data from client system; Pan/Tilt control from remote site; Free surveillance DeCal, 2 of 11.5"x8" and 8 of 3"x2"
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 16 Channel CCTV DVR System Powered by Dell with 8 CCD Security Cameras, 8 Security Camera Extension Cables DVS16K8DM 1R6
